oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Stockless organic farm
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Farming Systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The organic research farm Kourla is further developed as a model for stockless organic farming. Planning and book keeping is launched using the PeltotukiPro programme and the NutikkaPro map programme. Records of soil fertility are regulary made. The plots are offered to other units for experiments. Detailed research programmes are planned yearly.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Project} Stockless organic farm. [Karjaton luomutila.] Runs 2002 - 2004. Project Leader(s): Sch√§fer, Winfried, MTT Agrifood Research Finland.
